channel.title: How To Add Drops?
channel.description:
Hey I need help adding drops to npcs on my source this is what i put in for corp to drop
#Corpreal Beast 8133:1 13740:1
Just testing it, and im pretty sure this means that 13740(divine) will be dropped everykill but when i killed corp he didnt drop it what do i do? I got this when i ran the server but the server still runs
java.util.NoSuchElementException: No line found at java.util.Scanner.nextLime(Unkown Source) at server.model.npcs.NPCDrops.loadDrops(NPCDrops.java:37) at server.model.npcs.NPCDrop.(init)NPCDrops.java:15) at server.Server.(clinit)(Server.java:72)
This has to do something with that code i entered that im guessing not alowing to drop the divine so what do i do?

item.title: How To Add Drops?
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Did you use a tab or spaces when separating the two arguments?

Read full topic

item.title: How To Add Drops?
item.dc:creator: @tgm_clan tgm clan
item.description:
@tgm_clan wrote:

Check your corp drops on your npchandler.java. search “corperal” and find the items by the misc.random and add your item into it.

Read full topic

item.title: How To Add Drops?
item.dc:creator: @elite_expert elite expert
item.description:
@elite_expert wrote:

Hey I need help adding drops to npcs on my source this is what i put in for corp to drop

#Corpreal Beast
8133:1 13740:1

Just testing it, and im pretty sure this means that 13740(divine) will be dropped everykill but when i killed corp he didnt drop it what do i do?
